copyright: uncertain legal situation b/t Filmpodium and Ralph Schraivogel
title: Paul Newman, Filmpodium Zurich
medium: Screenprint and lithograph on white wove paper
description: The name of actor Paul Newman is printed on the poster, though his face is only visible in the letters of his name.  The two halves of his last name, "New" and "man" pivot on the word Paul, so that the word "Newman" is written as somewhat like a palindrome and can be read when viewed from opposite sides of the poster.
name: Poster
